languages.text: "Вы так и не поняли, верно? Невозможно контролировать бурю. Заставить огонь пощадить свою жертву... Или приказать солнцу всходить на западе. Это не то, с чем может справиться человек, лишь возжелав этого. Пускай даже речь о дочери навигаторского Дома". {n}Кассия резко выпрямляется, и взгляд ее становится бесстрастным и пустым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы так и не поняли, верно? Невозможно контролировать бурю. Заставить огонь пощадить свою жертву... Или приказать солнцу всходить на западе. Это не то, с чем может справиться человек, лишь возжелав этого. Пускай даже речь о дочери навигаторского Дома". {n}Кассия резко выпрямляется, и взгляд ее становится бесстрастным и пустым.{/n}

languages.text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы так и не поняли, верно? Невозможно контролировать бурю. Заставить огонь пощадить свою жертву... Или приказать солнцу всходить на западе. Это не то, с чем может справиться человек, лишь возжелав этого. Пускай даже речь о дочери навигаторского Дома". {n}Кассия резко выпрямляется, и взгляд ее становится бесстрастным и пустым.{/n}

Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens, and her gaze becomes impassive and vacant.{/n}

These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

languages.text: 「まだ気づいていないんですね？嵐を服従させることも、火の犠牲者を救うことも、太陽を水平線の反対側から昇らせることもできないのです。これらは、単にそうしたいと思うだけでは成し遂げられないことなのだから。たとえそれが航宙士一家の娘であったとしてもです」{n}カシアは突然背筋を伸ばし、その視線は無表情で虚ろになる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まだ気づいていないんですね？嵐を服従させることも、火の犠牲者を救うことも、太陽を水平線の反対側から昇らせることもできないのです。これらは、単にそうしたいと思うだけでは成し遂げられないことなのだから。たとえそれが航宙士一家の娘であったとしてもです」{n}カシアは突然背筋を伸ばし、その視線は無表情で虚ろになる。{/n}

languages.text: “莫非你还没有意识到吗？你无法驾驭风暴，无法命令火焰放过它的受害者，也无法命令恒星从地平线的另一边升起。这些事情注定会发生，不会由于某个人的愿望改变，即便那个人是导航者家族的女儿，也无济于事。”{n}卡西娅突然挺直了身子，目光变得冷漠而空洞。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “莫非你还没有意识到吗？你无法驾驭风暴，无法命令火焰放过它的受害者，也无法命令恒星从地平线的另一边升起。这些事情注定会发生，不会由于某个人的愿望改变，即便那个人是导航者家族的女儿，也无济于事。”{n}卡西娅突然挺直了身子，目光变得冷漠而空洞。{/n}

languages.text: «Todavía no se ha dado cuenta, ¿verdad? No se puede domar una tormenta. No se puede obligar a un incendio a perdonar a sus víctimas. No se puede ordenar al sol que salga por el otro lado del horizonte. No son cosas que una persona pueda lograr simplemente con el deseo de hacerlo, por más que la persona en cuestión sea la heredera de una casa de Navegantes». {n}Cassia se endereza de repente y su mirada se vuelve impasible y vacía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Todavía no se ha dado cuenta, ¿verdad? No se puede domar una tormenta. No se puede obligar a un incendio a perdonar a sus víctimas. No se puede ordenar al sol que salga por el otro lado del horizonte. No son cosas que una persona pueda lograr simplemente con el deseo de hacerlo, por más que la persona en cuestión sea la heredera de una casa de Navegantes». {n}Cassia se endereza de repente y su mirada se vuelve impasible y vacía.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt es immer noch nicht begriffen, nicht wahr? Ein Sturm lässt sich nicht bändigen. Ein Feuer lässt sich nicht dazu zwingen, sein Opfer zu verschonen. Die Sonne lässt sich nicht befehlen, auf der anderen Seite des Horizonts aufzugehen. So etwas lässt sich nicht bewerkstelligen, einfach weil man es sich wünscht. Auch nicht als Tochter eines Navigatorenhauses." {n}Cassia richtet sich plötzlich auf und ihr Blick wird teilnahmslos und leer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt es immer noch nicht begriffen, nicht wahr? Ein Sturm lässt sich nicht bändigen. Ein Feuer lässt sich nicht dazu zwingen, sein Opfer zu verschonen. Die Sonne lässt sich nicht befehlen, auf der anderen Seite des Horizonts aufzugehen. So etwas lässt sich nicht bewerkstelligen, einfach weil man es sich wünscht. Auch nicht als Tochter eines Navigatorenhauses." {n}Cassia richtet sich plötzlich auf und ihr Blick wird teilnahmslos und leer.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous n'avez donc toujours pas compris ? Nul ne peut espérer maîtriser une tempête. Ou forcer un incendie à épargner ses victimes. Ou encore faire en sorte que le soleil se lève de l'autre côté de l'horizon. Personne ne peut accomplir de telles prouesses, même avec la meilleure volonté du monde. Pas même la fille d'une maison de navigateurs. » {n}Cassia se redresse soudainement, le regard impassible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez donc toujours pas compris ? Nul ne peut espérer maîtriser une tempête. Ou forcer un incendie à épargner ses victimes. Ou encore faire en sorte que le soleil se lève de l'autre côté de l'horizon. Personne ne peut accomplir de telles prouesses, même avec la meilleure volonté du monde. Pas même la fille d'une maison de navigateurs. » {n}Cassia se redresse soudainement, le regard impassible.{/n}

languages.text: "Henüz farkına varamadın, değil mi? Fırtınayı zapt edemezsin. Ateşi, kurbanını bağışlamaya zorlayamazsın. Güneşin batıdan doğmasını buyuramazsın. Sırf istediğin için yapabileceğin şeyler değil bunlar. Bir Rotacı Hanesi'nin kızı olsan bile bu böyle." {n}Cassia, bir anda doğruluyor. Bakışları donuklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You still have not realised, have you? A storm cannot be brought to heel. A fire cannot be forced to spare its victim. The sun cannot be commanded to rise on the other side of the horizon. These are not things a person can accomplish simply by having the desire to do so. Even if that person is a daughter of a Navigator House." {n}Cassia suddenly straightens and her gaze becomes impassive and blank.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Henüz farkına varamadın, değil mi? Bir fırtınayı zapt edemezsin. Bir ateşi kurbanını bağışlamaya zorlayamazsın. Güneşin batıdan doğmasını buyuramazsın. Sırf istediğin için yapabileceğin şeyler değil bunlar. Bir Rotacı Hanesinin kızı olsan bile." {n}Cassia bir anda doğruluyor. Duygusuz ve donuk bakışlara bürünüyor.{/n}
